header.description: Property.  A header, used for interpreting the poses

pose.description: Property.  DISCLAIMER: This field is not in use yet and all other poses  are still interpreted in the header frame.  https://github.com/ros-planning/moveit/pull/2037  implements the actual logic for this field.  ---  The object's pose relative to the header frame.  The shapes and subframe poses are defined relative to this pose.

id.description: Property.  The id of the object (name used in MoveIt)

type.description: Property.  The object type in a database of known objects
